ai-patthana21.24:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.24:0.3_0: Telling for the sake of finding faults,
ai-patthana21.24:1.1_0: Not for the sake of seeing, nor for the sake of seeing, you should give up cause and condition.
ai-patthana21.24:2.1_0: Not for the sake of developing or cultivating the teaching, they don’t give up the cause or condition for the sake of development.
ai-patthana21.24:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up without seeing a cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.24:3.1_1: Neither have no cause or condition for the sake of development, nor for the sake of developing, nor for the sake of developing, they give up causes and reasons.
ai-patthana21.24:3.1_2: The root of tree is finished.
